tool.name: GodmdPrep
tool.description: Helper bb to prepare inputs for the GOdMD tool module.

param.name: input_pdb_orig_path
param.help: Input PDB file to be used as origin in the conformational transition

param.name: input_pdb_target_path
param.help: Input PDB file to be used as target in the conformational transition

param.name: outname_output_aln_orig_path
param.help: Output GOdMD alignment file corresponding to the origin structure of the conformational transition

param.name: outname_output_aln_target_path
param.help: Output GOdMD alignment file corresponding to the target structure of the conformational transition

param.name: config_json
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax
